title: Badminton Game
description: An interactive web-based badminton game where players can compete against AI opponents or friends. The game features realistic physics, smooth animations, and responsive controls. Players can customize their characters and rackets, and compete in various modes including single-player, multiplayer, and tournament mode.
tech: Canvas API for rendering the game
Physics engine (e.g., Matter.js) for realistic ball movement and collisions
Web Audio API for sound effects and music
Local Storage or IndexedDB for saving player progress and game state
